metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15723 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Irssi before 1.0.5, overlong nicks or targets may result in a NULL pointer dereference while splitting the message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.5').
